answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Durham, NC has a Cultural Advisory Board.  They help promote economic development through arts and culture, and they can advise city departments on ways to use culture to help advance their goals.
They also advocate for funding for arts programs and facilities, and advise the City on implementing public arts programs.
For more information click the link below.
http://www.durhamnc.gov/departments/clerk/boards.cfm

author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Rancho Cordova, CA is interested in starting an arts commission, arts advocacy group, advisory committee, etc.  The city hasn’t decided to create a full-on commission but would like to know what others have done around the “arts”; what types of options are available to explore further.   
Thanks!    
Nancy  
Nancy J. Pearl  
Communications Director  
City of Rancho Cordova  
(916) 851-8791  
npearl@cityofranchocordova.org
title: Arts Commission, Advocacy Group, Committee
